thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Jana

author: Jana
title: Jana
text: I found this website to buy books when my daughter started college. If the books are available, we order from here it is so much cheaper. I also order books for the preschool I work for. The books are cheap:) I usually get the good condition books and so far they have looked new and hardly used. I have told several friends about about Thrift Books. I have had no complaints so far.
